comments.html: We dont use vpc in our setup for vxlan and evpn.We use individual Unique next hop for each Leaf pair .In this case convergence works out easily, when S1--A link fails, S1 withdraws the MAC address and IP address and traffic automatically switches from S1 to S2.

comments.html: Many servers (hosts) dont support vpc or multi chassis LAG and hence it is easy to implement vxlan evpn fabrics without LAGs
